page.title: 08THE DAY OF A SENIOR CHILD.
page.content: I am 16 years old. I attend Ryton Comprehensive School. At 9.00 we have registration. First lesson is history. We have an essay to write - Improving Landlords and the Enclosure Movement. After Prefect duty at break I go to R.E. and learn about the Sermon on the Mount and nuclear disarmament. I think everyone should get rid of nuclear weapons. I go home for dinner.Some people stay and have packed lunches as school meals are not popular. Afternoon lessons begin with English.We are reading a poem called "Death on a Live Wire",which is very morbid.On Fridays instead of cooking we go to the nursery to help. Last lesson is maths, which finishes at 3.35. I am taking 7 'O' levels and a C.S.E. in maths.
